Description: AWS CloudFormation Template: Multi-AZ, Load Balanced and Auto-Scaled Apache Web Server

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

PublicSubnets.Description: The list of Subnet IDs for the VPC

LoadBalancerTargetGroup.Description: Target group ARN for the load balancer

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable HTTP access on port 80 and SSH on port 22

Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd
systemctl start httpd
systemctl enable httpd
echo '${AWS::StackName} - Web Server' > /var/www/html/index.html

WebsiteURL.Description: URL for newly created load balancer
